title: Traditional Chinese Tea Ritual in Sapphire and Gold
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed, photorealistic vertical image (9:16 aspect ratio) of an elegant traditional Chinese tea ceremony. Close-up shot focusing on the hands of a woman wearing a richly embroidered dark sapphire blue traditional Chinese jacket (Qipao style). She is delicately pouring hot water from a ceramic teapot onto a dark Yixing clay teapot on a polished bamboo tea table. The setup includes four jade-green celadon teacups, a wooden tea board, a smoking bronze incense burner, and a large green storage jar. Background features a traditional Chinese screen painting (shanshui landscape, pink blossoming trees, misty mountains), soft diffused light, volumetric lighting, deep rich colors, Traditional Chinese Aesthetics, Donghua Chinese style inspiration.
negativePrompt: low quality, bad anatomy, deformed, worst quality, extra limbs, jpeg artifacts, blurry, text, signature, watermark, cartoon, sketch, monochrome, low contrast, unrealistic shading, modern objects
